start.message: Welcome to PostgramX Buy and sell Telegram ads with escrow and auto-posting. Tap Open App to continue, or learn more about escrow below.

about_escrow.message: About escrow Escrow keeps the advertiser's funds on hold until the ad is published and delivery is verified. How it works 1) The advertiser funds the deal - money is held. 2) The channel publishes the post at the agreed time. 3) We verify the post stays live until the deadline. 4) Funds are released to the channel. If conditions are not met, a refund is issued.

help.message:
Need help getting started? Here is the flow:
1) Advertisers create a deal in the App.
2) Channel owners verify their channel by adding the bot as admin.
3) Escrow holds funds until the post goes live.
4) Both sides can track status inside the App.
5) Use notifications here for quick updates.

Tap a button below to continue.
